cz.zcu.kiv.dfs_simulator.simulation.hierarchy

Interface HierarchicalAccessMonitor

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    HierarchicalPlanner, LRUCascadeMigrationPlanner

    public interface HierarchicalAccessMonitor
    Monitors file access during simulation of a hierarchical method.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onAfterAccess(FsFile file, ModelServerNode server, SimulationTask task, DfsSimulatorLogger logger, long sTime)
      Will be called EXACTLY ONCE after file has been processed during a specific SimulationTask.
      void onBeforeAccess(FsFile file, ModelServerNode server, SimulationTask task, DfsSimulatorLogger logger, long sTime)
      Will be called before file is accessed during a specific SimulationTask.

    • Method Detail

      • onBeforeAccess

        void onBeforeAccess(FsFile file,
                    ModelServerNode server,
                    SimulationTask task,
                    DfsSimulatorLogger logger,
                    long sTime)
        Will be called before file is accessed during a specific SimulationTask. File can be accessed MULTIPLE times during single task when dynamic pathing is enabled.
        Parameters:
        file - accessed file
        server - server, on which the file is present
        task - running simulation task
        logger - current simulation logger
        sTime - current simulation time

      • onAfterAccess

        void onAfterAccess(FsFile file,
                   ModelServerNode server,
                   SimulationTask task,
                   DfsSimulatorLogger logger,
                   long sTime)
        Will be called EXACTLY ONCE after file has been processed during a specific SimulationTask.
        Parameters:
        file - accessed file
        server - server, on which the file is present
        task - finished simulation task
        logger - current simulation logger
        sTime - current simulation time
